promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple monkey normal-type pokemon holding an white axe. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pongoraxe, a a gigantic simple monkey normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Pain-full Punch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "normal" or "Pongoraxe". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, monkey-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This colossal primate uses its mighty fists to vanquish foes. It resides amongst peaceful hamlets, charming locals with its docile daytime demeanor.
